document_data.caption: A map of the Temple District of Athkatla.
document_data.name: Aundle's Walk
document_data.starts: Crossing of [[Oblade Street]] and the [[Street of the Seven Altars]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Aundle's Walk''' was a street in the rich [[Athkatla/Temple District|Temple District]] of [[Athkatla]].
document_data.Description: Aundle's Walk began at the intersection of [[Oblade Street]] and the [[Street of the Seven Altars]] with the [[Godsmoot]] to its west. From there, Aundle's Walk ran southwest.
document_data.Notable Locations:
*[[The Temple Bell]], once home of the [[Flamaerdown]] family, later turned into a shop that dealt in religious magic, items, and paraphernalia as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
*The [[Pride of Athkatla]], an enclosed marketplace comprising rows upon rows of curtained boutiques and mercantile stalls that stood on the intersection of Aundle's Walk, Oblade Street and the Street of the Seven Altars.
*The [[Harfin Draether]], a quality tavern that stood across the street from the Pride of Athkatla.
